source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select Step    ,a.callid    ,objid,    pendinggroup    ,
case when  [Sd_Rule]= 'Min' then  Min( case when a.Startdate='1900-01-01 00:00:00.000' then NULL else a.Startdate End ) when  [Sd_Rule]= 'Max' then  Max( case when a.Startdate='1900-01-01 00:00:00.000' then NULL else a.Startdate End ) end  SD , 
case when  [ed_Rule]= 'Min' then  Min( case when a.EndDate='1900-01-01 00:00:00.000' then NULL else a.EndDate End )when  [ed_Rule]= 'Max' then  Max( case when a.EndDate='1900-01-01 00:00:00.000' then NULL else a.EndDate End ) end  ED     
,startweek    ,endweek,    Wkopenat,    Dates,    a.Name  ,U_StepFatherGroup,    U_GoalInDays 
, row_number() over (partition by a.callid, pendinggroup ,  Wkopenat order by a.callid, Wkopenat, U_StepFatherGroup, Name ) Hirarchy
From 
(

		select 
		Step, callid, objid, pendinggroup, StartDate , EndDate , datepart(week, StartDate) startweek,0 endweek, 0 Wkopenat, StartDate as Dates--, Row_number() over (partition by object order by dattime asc) StartLine , 
		, t1.Name, t1.[Sd_Rule], [Ed_Rule],[U_StepFatherGroup],t1.[U_GoalInDays]
		from  [sap].[Mrr_ServiceFlow] t0  inner join SAP.[Mrr_ServiceGoal] t1 on t0.Step=t1.[U_StepName] collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP850_CI_AS

		union all 

		select  
		Step, callid, objid,pendinggroup,  StartDate , EndDate , 0 startweek,datepart(week, EndDate) endtweek , 0  , EndDate
		, t1.Name, t1.[Sd_Rule], [Ed_Rule],[U_StepFatherGroup],t1.[U_GoalInDays]
		from  [sap].[Mrr_ServiceFlow] t0  inner join SAP.[Mrr_ServiceGoal] t1 on t0.Step=t1.[U_StepName] collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP850_CI_AS 

		union all 

		select  
		Step, callid, objid,pendinggroup,  StartDate , EndDate , 0 startweek, 0 endtweek ,  datepart(week, t2.date_ ) Wkopenat, t2.date_ Dates
		, t1.Name, t1.[Sd_Rule], [Ed_Rule],[U_StepFatherGroup],t1.[U_GoalInDays]
		from  [sap].[Mrr_ServiceFlow] t0  right join

				(
				select  date_ 
				from  srv.DimDate
				)
 
		t2 on  StartDate < t2.date_ and (EndDate >= t2.date_ or Isnull(EndDate,'')='' )
		inner join SAP.[Mrr_ServiceGoal] t1 on t0.Step=t1.[U_StepName] collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP850_CI_AS
) A
Group  by 
Step    ,a.callid ,objid   ,  Dates,  pendinggroup        ,startweek    ,endweek,    Wkopenat ,   a.Name    ,Sd_Rule,    Ed_Rule    ,U_StepFatherGroup,    U_GoalInDays

order by Dates

select YEAR(ScarSendingDate) as 'Year', DATEPART(WEEK,ScarSendingDate) as 'Week' , SupplierName,SupplierNo,PartDescription,PN,MRBNo,Descriptionofdeviation,ScarSendingDate,
AllowedReturnDate,ReminderDate,ScarReturningDate

 from ScoreCards.Mrr_ScarLog
 where YEAR(ScarSendingDate)>='2016'

select YEAR(ActualAuditDate) as 'Year',DATEPART(WEEK,ActualAuditDate) as 'Week', *
 from [ScoreCards].[Mrr_Suppliers_Audit_Activities_Followup]
 where SupplierName<>'Supplier Name'
